cards.title: Ritual of Catastrophe
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it and you may play a Sacrifice card.
When the last Ritual Token is removed from this, destroy up to 2 other Ongoing or Environment cards, each non-Hero target deals itself 3 Irreducible Infernal Damage, and destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Soulbinder, The Worth of a Life

cards.title: Ritual of Salvation
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it and you may play a Sacrifice card.
When the last Ritual Token is removed from this, each Hero target regains 3 HP and each player draws a card. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Soulbinder, The Worth of a Life

cards.title: Ritual of Transferrence
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it and you may play a Sacrifice card.
When the last Ritual Token is removed from this, up to 3 Targets regain 2 HP and 1 Target deals itself Toxic damage equal to the total HP regained this way. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Soulbinder, The Worth of a Life
